title: Diana’s Spectacular (Not Really) Art Hub
content:
[[module CSS]]
@import url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/component:wondertainmenttheme/code/1);
[[/module]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:pride-highlighter |inc-s9-lsb-alt= --]]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module css]]
.footnoteref{
color: #f4a6cb;
}
.danke{
padding: 5px 5px 5px 15px;
margin-bottom:10px;
width: 100%;
font-family: monospace;
font-size: 1.1em; }

.agent{
background-color:#f9edf5;
border: 3px solid #f4a6cb;
color: #f469ac;
}

.site{
background-color:#f9edf5;
border: 3px solid #AAAA55;
color: #f469ac;
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="danke agent"]]
| Edit: check the bottom for more updated art examples, many of this stuff is very old. 

| So here is my wonderful (not really) collection of SCP art. Fun fact I actually published this too soon earlier and I had to delete it to save it from misunderstood downvote hell. So here we are now lol.


| Miss Sweetie is my favorite SCP, I love her so very much. Here’s some art of her with lyrics from a tangled before ever After song lol

[[collapsible]]
[[image 3296 width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/collapsible]]

| Josie was my first favorite SCP. Very, very pure....

[[collapsible]]
[[image Josie529 width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/collapsible]]

| I can’t draw cats but whatever ya know?

| Sweet, Sweet 166. My baby

[[collapsible]]
[[image SCP166 width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/collapsible]]

| 040 is a sweet baby and I love her 

[[collapsible]]
[[image 040 width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/collapsible]]

| Iris,,,,, best,,,,,

[[collapsible]]
[[image Iris105 width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/collapsible]]



[[collapsible]]
[[image 2288 width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/collapsible]]

I love 2288 so much. They did something successfully that I never could—an SCP that speaks up about how they hate containment. It’s a very interesting story, and I like it a lot.

[[collapsible]]
[[image 3309-1 width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/collapsible]]

3309 IS SO GOOD IT’S SO CREATIVE PLEASE READ IT

My SCPs:
Currently only Marie’s scp is up and I’m still trying to process the fact that I didn’t fail lol. Nicholas’s majorly failed so I got some major rewrites.


| Nichola. --I’ll put the number once she’s up.-- Never posted her, but I used her in 5019.

[[collapsible]]
[[image Nichola width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/collapsible]]

|Edit: [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4168|Decomposing Love]]] is now out on the main site as SCP-4168.

|Marie from the SCP I’m currently calling Decomposing Love. Don’t mind the old name on there~ 

[[collapsible]]
[[image Marie width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/collapsible]]

Also I’ll clarify because I want to, Marie only has one eye because she lost the other in a fire. It’s not related to the SCP she’s effected by.

[[collapsible]]
[[image Rotting width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[image 2rotting width="550px" style="border:1px solid #665731;" title="quotetext"]]
[[/collapsible]]

| Another Marie. Well, more of a poster for Decomposing Love. (Again don’t mind old name) Sketch and colored version.

------

Hello, it's Diana here finally adding more pieces to her art hub after a year.

[[div class="material-box"]]

[[div class="material-box"]]
[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ SCP-4319" hide="- Jess mock anime scene"]]
[[=image JessAnime.png width="500px"]]
Attention all those who love hating JGT. This is my first official release of a design for any of the characters. I've got KeeLee on the way. And you can interpret the characters to look like anything you want, this is just my portrayal. But here's the first, the girl who deserves better, Jess!
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ Simple Josie" hide="- Close"]]
[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dianas-spectacular-not-really-art-hub/simple%20josie.PNG width="350px"]]

:3
[[/collapsible]] 
[[/=]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP-2396 " hide="- Ms Sweetie"]]

------

Hi. It's another year. Diana is updating again. Some of these aren't new, I'm just only now getting them on here.

------

Hi. So many of these are outdated. For more recent artworks, check out my [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:scp-7578-veekat-fanart|veekat fanart]]], [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:scp-1273-jp-artwork| 1273 JP artwork]]], [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8095|Valentine in 8095]]], [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7908|7908]]], will update.
[[/div]]
author: DianaBerry
